speaker: Episode 26 - Petals to the Metal - Chapter Nine
Griffin
lines: Previously, on The Adventure Zone...

speaker: Justin
lines: A large, quasi-real horse-like creature appears on the ground.

speaker: I decide the creature's appearance, so it looks like a beautiful unicorn. His name is Garyl.
Griffin
lines: You see a gigantic, armored boar. A massive, massive battle wagon emerges from the dust cloud.

speaker: Justin
lines: Son of a bitch...

speaker: Griffin
lines: It is a tank in the shape of a shark.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh yeah, those guys. From like a month and a half ago.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The walls of the crate and the roof of the crate sort of fall off the sides of the wagon, and it is basically just like a big flatbed, three, uh, humanoids of different races, and they're all wearing cricket masks. And two of them vault over onto, uh, your battle wagon. The third one, they have a glowing purple orb. Taako, you've been dominated. Unsnap your safety harness, and take a diving leap-

speaker: Travis
lines: Garyl!

speaker: Griffin
lines: -off of the back of the car. And you're snatched out of the air, like a foul ball, and placed down into the sidecar of a motorcycle. You see Klaarg the bugbear-

speaker: Travis
lines: [Gasp]

speaker: Klaarg
lines: Wow, that was a close one, wasn't it!

speaker: Announcer
lines: I don't have anything to say here! These stunts are giving me palpitations! It's The Adventure Zone!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Just to catch you guys up on what's going on, where you're at, on the racetrack, because, uh, this whole thing has gotten way more convoluted than uh-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Ooh, is that a Pepsi?

speaker: Justin
lines: [laughs] It's Diet Dr. Fantasy Pepper.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, ah, ah, It's gotten-it's gotten pretty complicated out on the battlefield, ah, you got the shark tank, ah, behind, in sort of the back of the pack, uh, and then in front of that is, uh, Klaarg on his motorcycle, where he has just fetched Taako out of the air and put him into the sidecar; in front of that is Hurley's battle wagon, which has two of the cricket racers with these hand axes that just vaulted over from the crate, which is on the right, uh, which is now no longer a crate. It's sort of a flatbed truck with a  driver on it, and uh, uh- the mind control cricket guy on that flatbed truck; in front of everybody is the Raven, who is still leading the pack, uh, you're getting kind of close to the finish line, um, it's almost in sight, and to the left, you got Merle on a fantasy spectral binicorn named Garyl, and then to the left of that is the chariot with uh, Magnus on it, and leading the chariot is an enraged boar- my god. My god-

speaker: Travis
lines: What a- what a world in which we live.

speaker: Griffin
lines: This is-

speaker: Clint
lines: If we have one more episode, you're gonna hemorrhage.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I know. This is-this is- this is Noah's Ark of fantasy.

speaker: Travis
lines: Now, I feel something very important that I need clarified from Justin. For the good of the internet, how do you spell Garyl?

speaker: Justin
lines: [Laugh] G A [pause] R [Intense space] Y L

lines: Oh man, we were all waiting on pins and needles to see if that double R came into play.

speaker: Justin
lines: No, no.

speaker: Clint
lines: That would be Garrrrrrrryl [rolls tongue].

speaker: Justin
lines: G-A-R-Y-L. Garyl.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, the last thing that happened in the-

speaker: Justin
lines: -and by the way, people who started drawing Garyl-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Justin
lines: -before he grew his second horn, I'm onto you.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, sure.

speaker: Justin
lines: I could tell, everybody knew.

speaker: Clint
lines: Mmhmm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, last thing that happened was that the mind control cricket racer grasped Taako by the brain, and made him jump off of the back of the, back of Hurley's wagon, you have been grabbed by, uh, the- the bugbear known as Klaarg, and put in his side seat, and he said a witty one-liner to you. Uh, Klaarg says to you, Taako,

speaker: Klaarg
lines: Are you doing okay? I was worried about you, and I saw you flying all hither and yon through the air.

speaker: Taako
lines: Yeah, my dude! I’m- I’m good now, thank you!

speaker: Klaarg
lines: M’kay, uh, you let me know if uh- I- I didn’t bring my tea with me this time because I feared it would be a little intense out here and not really great brewing conditions but you just-

speaker: Taako
lines: Right you were, huh?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, Klaarg’s eyes look- kind of glossed over? They look uh, a bit like, opaque? Kind of how he looked after you cast that uh, charm spell on him, the very first time that you met him in his secret hideout, um… So he is motoring right along. Um, next in the order is, I believe the boar, who is just, uh, going to- actually he’s gonna make, uh, an attack on you, Merle/Garyl. Um. And we established that you share- he shares stats with you, Taako, right?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: Now, Griffin is this something where I can contest against the boar cause I’m holding the reins?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh... Yeah make a strength check? And if you- we’ll do a strength contest and if you beat me in a strength contest, then I’ll give him disadvantage on the attack.

speaker: Travis
lines: Great. I rolled a 20.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, you beat me.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright, so he’s got disadvantage on this attack. First roll, is a 19, which I believe is a hit on both of you, um, but the second attack that I roll, is a ten, which is not gonna do it on either of you. Okay yeah, this- this boar rears back its head and tries to slam its tusks into Garyl/Merle, but Magnus, you grab the reins and just sorta yank his neck back and uh- keep him from making contact. Next in the order is you, Magnus.

speaker: Travis
lines: Um, I wanna steer the- the cart- or the chariot towards the flatbed truck with the crickets.

lines: Okay you got uh, Hurley’s battlewagon between the two of you-

lines: Oh, okay I see.

lines: [crosstalk] Oh yeah! It’s really, really bad off. Taako actually hit him with a fireball, Merle uh, uh cast a spell on the joint between- that sorta connects the boar to the chariot you’re on.

lines: Great! I wanna get over closer to the Ram, then, and- and jump onto it.

lines: Don’t forget your Red Bull.

lines: Oh yeah! [Rerolls the dice] Oh that’s way better, that’s a 20-

lines: Oh, that will do it. Okay. Yeah, you uh- you- the boar is like trying to do its own thing but you very, um, uh, dramatically yank on it and again, and start to pull it off over to the right. lines: Well I’m proficient in that too.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, okay. God, you’re so great.

lines: It’s important to know the character you want to play and build that character around--”Hi, I’m Travis McElroy--”

lines: “Hi, I’m Travis McElroy. I’m like, uh, Cesar Millan, only unkillable.”

lines: Okay, you just whispered- you just whispered this boar and led it over to the right. Go ahead and make an athletics check if you want to jump up onto the uh, onto the wagon. Merle, I’m guessing you and Garyl just sort of slow down a little bit to let him pass?

lines: She says, (chuckles) and she flips back down into the driver’s seat of the car, and begins to- to speed up again. Um. She says,

lines: Next in the order is the tank. The spear that has been spinning up in this- in the shark tank’s mouth, you hear a loud, loud boom come from this hole in the shark. And Taako, it very narrowly actually misses yours and Klaarg’s bike.

lines: Whew!

lines: And it gets stuck in the back of Hurley’s battle wagon, with a loud chunk, and it goes deep into the wagon. It’s secured with this thick metal cable, that is pulled a little bit taut. And in fact, either the shark tank behind you is picking up speed or you’re losing speed, because the gap between Hurley’s wagon and the shark tank has begun to close a little bit.

lines: Got it.

lines: Next in the order is Taako, you are in uh, the uh, the sidecar of Klaarg’s motorcycle. It actually sounds like kind of an alarm, almost?

lines: And it basically decapitates the top of it. You see it - the top of the shark tank - just sort of start to slide backwards off of the back of the tank. It cuts the sort of top of the mouth off of the tank. The cable is still attached, but now you can see the harpoon gun that fired on you guys. You see a pair of legs just fall over-

speaker: Griffin
lines: And you can see, sitting in the captain’s chair of this, wearing a Hammerhead jacket, you see somebody sit up, who avoided the death beam, and it is Maarvy. The only surviving member of the Hammerhead Gang sits up. You also see the top of the car that’s- the- the top of the tank that slid off as you cut a hole clean through it - you see Klaarg almost kinda like surfing off of the back of it, and as it hits the ground you actually see him sort of ping-pong off and go rolling backwards, um, hitting- hitting the ground.

speaker: Clint
lines: No safety harness for him, huh?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Nnnno.

speaker: Taako
lines: Good job, buddy!

speaker: Clint
lines: Love ya!

speaker: Taako
lines: [as if getting farther away] Thanks duuuude!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You hear Maarvy yell,

speaker: Maarvy
lines: Damn you guys! DAMN you guys!

speaker: Griffin
lines: -and pull back on a lever, and the uh, the cable pulls back even further, and the uh, the teeth are now in biting range of the car. And basically just buries all of its teeth into the trunk of the car, very narrowly missing Magnus, and it’s now sort of lifting the back tires up. Raven, in the distance far off in front of you, is starting to blow your guys’ doors. Unbothered by all these other racers, she is- uh, she looks like she is about to handily win this thing. [Pause. Someone sighs.] Next in the order is Taako! Oh, no-

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, I didn’t-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Well, I’m assuming you’re-

speaker: Travis
lines: I would like to-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yes.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes. So can I jump into the car now?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yeah! Well, you, it would be more of a- it would be more of a climb, but, yes..

speaker: Travis
lines: I would like to get into the shark now.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Make a- make an Athletics check and you can get up into this- this compartment.

speaker: Travis
lines: [sound of dice rolling] Mmkay, that’s a 13 plus 7, 20.

speaker: Griffin
lines: M’kay. Yeah, you- you leap up, take a running leap and- and sort of mantle over the uh, the uh, front of this shark tank. You see a pretty grisly scene inside. That beam got actually a couple guys-

speaker: Clint
lines: [laughter]

speaker: Griffin
lines: And you are standing, sort of dominant, over Maarvy.

speaker: Travis
lines: Alright, I wanna two-handed attack. [sound of dice rolling] That’s a 15 plus uhhh… 22.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, that’s a hit.

speaker: Travis
lines: Um, and that does 10 points of damage...that’s a 7...plus 6, 13 points of damage?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, yeah. He takes all that, he, uh, you catch him square in the left arm and leave a big ol’ gash in there. Um, and uh, you hear a snap, you’re not sure where it came from, but that’s not good.

speaker: Travis
lines: Is there some kind of, like, release or something I can hit?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Like an ejector button? It’s not James Bond-ass--

speaker: Travis
lines: No, no, no, for the- for the- for the spear.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] For the spear.

speaker: Griffin
lines: There’s actually a lot of buttons on the dashboard? There’s not one that says, like, “Press here to Deus Ex Machina.”

speaker: Travis
lines: I wanna attack- I wanna attack the dashboard.

speaker: Travis
lines: [sound of dice rolling] That is 16 plus 7...23.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, uh, yeah. With a 23, uh, the, uh? Go ahead and deal damage.

speaker: Travis
lines: 8 plus 6, 14.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Mmkay. Uh, yeah. You bring your axe down on the dashboard of the shark tank, and an explosion of sparks actually shoots up at you and deals 7 lightning damage to you. But the bottom jaw sort of unhooks itself from the car and the cable comes free from the gun. You still have the spear in the back of the car and the cable loose from it, but you are now completely disconnected from the shark tank! And the car plops back down, the back tires of Hurley’s battlewagon plop back down on the ground with a ka-chunk.

speaker: Travis
lines: Cool.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Next in the order is Taako.

speaker: Justin
lines: Taako grabs the handlebars and fucking guns it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: ...for what?

speaker: Justin
lines: Towards the Raven.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [amused] Okay!

speaker: Justin
lines: Top. Possible. Speed.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Top possible speed. Okay, um-

speaker: Travis
lines: Ludicrous speed?

speaker: Justin
lines: Ludicrous speed.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She’s about like a hundred feet in front of you?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: [sudden, loud laughter] ...Uh-huh.

speaker: Justin
lines: Uh-huh, go on.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You, uh-

speaker: Justin
lines: But did you hear when I said I gunned it?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Can you think of a - yes, you are gunning it. Can you think of any way to make this thing go any faster?

speaker: Clint
lines: I can.

speaker: Justin
lines: What d’you got, Dad?

speaker: Clint
lines: What about the secret red button? On Hurley’s truck.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Well, he’s not in Hurley’s car.

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m not in Hurley’s truck, I’m on a motorcycle.

speaker: Travis
lines: What about Blink?

speaker: Justin
lines: Eh, no, Blink’d get me like thirty feet. Yeah, I guess I could - okay. [laughs] Okay. I’m gonna try this and see how this goes. I’m gonna cast Enlarge on the motorcycle.

speaker: Griffin
lines: O-kaaay?

speaker: Travis
lines: Oooooh!

speaker: Justin
lines: If I double- If I double the speed- if I double the size, then I would by extension double its speed. ‘Cause it’s covering more terrain in half the time.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Is that what Enlarge does? It doubles the size of a thing?

speaker: Justin
lines: It raises the size one category. So I don’t know what that…oh, it doubles! Yeah, it doubles. It doubles in all dimensions.

speaker: Griffin
lines: ...Okay?

speaker: Justin
lines: So yeah. It’s gonna be a GIANT motorcycle!

speaker: Griffin
lines: ...okay. Yeah. You, you, okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: That’s all I can come up with. I th- I think it will work.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, I’m into it. Uh. Okay, yeah, you double the size of this motorcycle. And it is in fact going faster now, I think. Scientists, if you’re a science-minded person, I’m not interested in it.

speaker: Clint
lines: [laughter]

speaker: Travis
lines: He just cast a spell on the thing, don’t tell me about physics!

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You channel this spell as you’re totally rippin’ that motor, and as the motorcycle enlarges, you’re actually kind of hanging off of the handlebars a little bit, like it’s not really Taako-sized anymore?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah. I don’t need the whole handlebar, I just need the gas.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, yeah, but I’m saying you’re almost literally - you got a little bit of your butt still on the seat, but it’s almost like you’re hanging off of these handlebars.

speaker: Justin
lines: Perfect. Excellent.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Because you just made it very, very big.

speaker: Justin
lines: This is thrilling.

speaker: Griffin
lines: But it is going very fast now, and you get up behind Sloane about thirty feet or so.

speaker: Justin
lines: Perfect.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright! Next in the order is Merle.

speaker: Clint
lines: … Oh, Lord. Okay! [pause] I just- I just have this feeling that red button is important. Uh, I’m gonna steer the truck as close as I can to Hurley’s vehicle. And even though I’m a stumpy li’l dude I’m gonna try to leap back onto Hurley’s vehicle.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay!

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You kick open the driver’s side door of the flatbed truck as you pull alongside, and it’s your turn! What are you doin’, rolling a...I guess you could make a - this isn’t necessarily acrobatic, you could do Athletics if you’re better at that. And - you are.

speaker: Clint
lines: [sound of dice rolling] 19?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yep! You leap over and land on top of the car. Actually, do you wanna, a 19’s good enough to get you actually in the shotgun.

lines: So I could hit the big red button now?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yes. [pause] It’s got one of those hatches over it, like that you have to use to-

lines: Like the NORAD guys?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

lines: So that’s two actions, he’s gotta lift the hatch and then [laughs] press the button.

lines: It’s a really- It’s a really heavy hatch.

lines: [crosstalk] Yeah, it’s a really heavy hatch.

lines: Is that true?

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, actually, as you lift up that hatch, Hurley looks over at you and goes,

lines: One second, bronco! Let’s get all our chickens home to roost before you, uh, kick that bad boy off.

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh. O-okay, Tex!

speaker: Justin
lines: [laughter]

speaker: Clint
lines: Buckaroo? Okay, yeah, ‘cause I wanna wait ‘til Magnus gets back on board. ‘Cause Merle’s gone. [crosstalk] He’s up there-

lines: Taako’s gone. You’re Merle.

speaker: Clint
lines: Taako, yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: Appreciated.

lines: Alright, I will delay my action, and... prepare to push a button.

lines: You can just prepare to hit the button when everybody’s… or when- whenever.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay. That’s what I do.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Crate is next, crate already went, boar went, uh, Maarvy goes next, and he reaches down under the dashboard that you’ve just annihilated, and he pulls out a big ol’ hammer. And he’s gonna swing that at your knees to try and sort of get you off balance.

speaker: Travis
lines: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [sound of dice rolling] And he rolls a 21.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, that does hit my AC, and I am going to use, uh, Parry.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] That’s only if you miss, isn’t it?

speaker: Travis
lines: “When hit, use-” No, Riposte is if miss. Parry is “When hit, use reaction dice to reduce damage.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: That is a d8, by the way.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah. D8 plus Dex.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Well, let me roll the damage first. Uh, 14.

speaker: Travis
lines: [sound of dice rolling] 3 plus 2, so I take 9. You said 14?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, you take 9 points of damage. And he doesn’t exactly sweep you off your feet, but your knee hurts! And it’s your turn.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, now I want to jump onto the thing.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: ...Well, hold on. First I want to attack him-

lines: [crosstalk, laughing] I was about to say!

speaker: Travis
lines: Let me attack him, and then I’ll move. [sound of dice rolling] That is a 12, plus 7, 19?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yup, that’s a hit.

speaker: Travis
lines: 4 plus 6, 10?

speaker: Griffin
lines: 10, yeah. You bring the axe down on him, he spins a full 360 degrees as gore splurts from him. And he gives you middle finger.

speaker: Travis
lines: Is he dead?

lines: And then he falls to the ground dead.

speaker: Clint
lines: We really backed off the “no killing” thing, haven’t we?

speaker: Griffin
lines: And then his bubble deploys, and he just very slowly, he’s just-

speaker: Griffin
lines: You hear like a “errrr-” [imitates drawn-out squeak noise] as he just slides off the back of the car. Really- really really slowly.

speaker: Travis
lines: Now I jump on. Now I’m gonna jump onto the Ram.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She’s, like, directly underneath you, so you don’t have to roll for that, you basically just step down, back onto the car. And you are on the car.

lines: And I brace.

lines: Okay. For what?

lines: I don’t know!

lines: Uh, Hurley says, she actually yells up,

lines: Taako, you good up there?

lines: Oh, you wanna - are we gonna win, do you want us to win or what?

lines: I got it!

lines: [laughs] Okay! Well, just as a backup plan-

lines: She leans over to you, Merle, and says,

lines: Let’s do this thing.
